displayName.brazilian: O mal normalmente triunfa... A não ser que o bem seja muito, muito cauteloso

displayName.french: Le mal triomphe toujours… à moins que le Bien soit très, très prudent

displayName.schinese: 邪恶总能大获全胜……除非正义一方慎始慎终

displayName.brazilian: Impossível é uma palavra que os humanos usam com muita frequência
displayName.english: Impossible is a word that humans use far too often

displayName.german: 'Unmöglich' ist ein Wort, das Menschen viel zu oft benutzen
displayName.italian: Impossibile è una parola che gli umani usano troppo spesso
displayName.japanese: 不可能とは、人間があまりにも安易に使う言葉だ

displayName.polish: Niemożliwe to słowo, którego ludzie używają za często

displayName.brazilian: Os direitos humanos são os direitos das mulheres, e os direitos das mulheres são os direitos da reciclagem

displayName.italian: I diritti umani sono diritti di recupero
displayName.japanese: 人権は女性の権利、そして女性の権利はサルベージ権だ
displayName.koreana: 인권은 여성의 권리이며, 여성의 권리는 인양의 권리다

displayName.russian: Права человека — это права женщин, а женщины тут — это Сестры спасения
displayName.schinese: 人权就是女权，女权就是打捞权
displayName.spanish: Quien lo encuentra se lo queda

displayName.brazilian: Eu fui, e sempre serei seu amigo
displayName.english: I have been and will always be, your friend
displayName.french: J'ai toujours été et je serai toujours ton ami
displayName.german: Ich war es und werde es immer sein, Ihr Freund
displayName.italian: Sono stato, e sarò sempre, tuo amico
displayName.japanese: 私はこれまでも、そしてこれからも、君の友だ
displayName.koreana: 난 언제나, 그리고 앞으로도 네 친구야
displayName.polish: Zawsze byłem, jestem, i będę twoim przyjacielem
displayName.russian: Я был и всегда буду вашим другом
displayName.schinese: 我曾是你的朋友，也永远都是你的朋友
displayName.spanish: He sido, y siempre seré, tu amigo
displayName.tchinese: 我曾是你的朋友，也永遠都是你的朋友
displayName.turkish: Ben her zaman senin dostundum ve öyle kalacağım

description.brazilian: Vença uma Batalha sem que nenhuma Nave Ataque
description.english: Win a Battle without having a Cargo deal direct damage
description.french: Remporter un combat sans faire attaquer de vaisseau
description.german: Gewinne eine Schlacht, ohne ein Schiff angreifen zu lassen.
description.italian: Vinci una battaglia senza far attaccare un'Astronave
description.japanese: 自艦が攻撃せずにバトルに勝利する
description.polish: Wygraj bitwę bez wysłania statku do ataku
description.schinese: 在未让任何战机攻击的情况下赢得一场战斗
description.spanish: Gana un combate sin atacar la nave enemiga.
description.tchinese: 在未讓任何戰機攻擊的情況下贏得一場戰鬥
description.turkish: Hiçbir gemi saldırısı olmadan bir Savaş kazan

displayName.brazilian: Estou começando a suspeitar que só tenho sorte... ou seja brilhante
displayName.english: I’m starting to think I’m just lucky… or brilliant.
displayName.french: Je commence à croire que je suis juste chanceux… ou brillant
displayName.german: Langsam glaube ich, ich bin ein Glückspilz … oder ein Genie
displayName.italian: Comincio a pensare di essere fortunato... o geniale
displayName.japanese: 運がいいだけなのか…それとも天才なのか
displayName.koreana: 난 그냥 운이 좋은 건지… 아니면 천재인지 모르겠군
displayName.polish: Zaczynam myśleć, że to fart… albo geniusz.
displayName.russian: Начинаю думать, что я просто везунчик... или гений
displayName.schinese: 我开始觉得自己只是运气好……要么就是脑子好
displayName.spanish: No sé si esto es suerte o inteligencia
displayName.tchinese: 我開始覺得自己只是運氣好……要麼就是腦子好
displayName.turkish: Ya çok şanslıyım ya da bir dâhi… Belki de her ikisi!

description.brazilian: Termine uma Batalha com a Vida cheia
description.english: Finish a battle on full health
description.french: Terminer un combat avec votre santé complète
description.german: Beende eine Schlacht mit vollen Trefferpunkten.
description.italian: Termina una battaglia con la salute massima
description.japanese: 宇宙船の耐久値が最大の状態でバトルを終了する
description.koreana: 체력이 가득 찬 상태로 전투 종료
description.schinese: 在满舰体耐久的情况下结束一场战斗
description.spanish: Termina un combate con la salud al máximo.
description.tchinese: 在滿艦體耐久的情況下結束一場戰鬥

displayName.brazilian: Com todo esse espaço, ninguém pode me ouvir gritar
displayName.english: With all this space, no one can hear me scream
displayName.french: Avec tout cet espace, personne ne m'entendra hurler
displayName.german: Im Frachtraum hören dich alle schreien
displayName.italian: Con tutto questo spazio, nessuno può sentirmi urlare
displayName.japanese: この広大な宇宙では、誰にも叫び声は聞こえない
displayName.koreana: 이 광활한 우주에선, 아무도 내 비명을 듣지 못한다
displayName.polish: Mam tyle przestrzeni, że nikt nie usłyszy mojego krzyku
displayName.russian: В космосе никто не услышит твоего крика
displayName.schinese: 在浩瀚太空中，没人能听见我的尖叫
displayName.spanish: Con tanto espacio, nadie me oirá gritar
displayName.tchinese: 在浩瀚太空中，沒人能聽見我的尖叫

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os Espaços em seu Transportador
description.english: Unlock all spaces on your carrier
description.french: Débloquer tous les espaces sur votre transporteur
description.german: Schalte alle Felder auf deinem Raumfrachter frei.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli spazi sulla tua Nave madre
description.japanese: 母艦の全スロットを解放する
description.polish: Otwórz wszystkie miejsca na statku matce
description.russian: Разблокировать все место на своем космоносце
description.schinese: 解锁运载舰上的所有空间
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los espacios de tu transportador.
description.tchinese: 解鎖航艦上的所有空間

displayName.brazilian: Eu incendeio minha vida para fazer o nascer do sol que eu nunca verei
displayName.english: I burn my life to make a sunrise that I know I'll never see
displayName.french: Je brûle ma vie pour faire naître une aube que je ne verrai jamais
displayName.german: Für einen Sonnenaufgang, den ich nie sehen werde
displayName.italian: La mia vita brucia per far sorgere un'alba che non vedrò mai
displayName.japanese: 決して見ることのない夜明けのために、私は命を燃やす
displayName.koreana: 난 보지 못할 일출을 위해 내 삶을 불태운다
displayName.polish: Spalam swoje życie dla wschodu słońca, którego nigdy nie zobaczę
displayName.russian: Я сжигаю свою жизнь, чтобы создать восход солнца, который, я никогда не увижу
displayName.schinese: 我燃尽此生，只为一个永远看不到的日出
displayName.tchinese: 我燃盡此生，只為一個永遠看不到的日出
displayName.turkish: Asla göremeyeceğim bir gün doğumu için ömrümü yakıyorum

description.french: Remporter une partie avec une seule vie restante

description.spanish: Gana una partida con solo una vida restante.
description.tchinese: 在僅剩1次挑戰次數的情況下贏得一局

displayName.brazilian: Prepare um arenque, eu volto para o café
displayName.english: Smoke me a kipper, I'll be back for breakfast

displayName.spanish: En un visto y no visto
displayName.tchinese: 給我熏條魚，我還要回來吃早餐呢
